summary.subject: Call for Workshop Proposals: 48th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE 2026)

conference_details.name: 48th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Software Engineering

workshop_information.description: Workshops provide a forum for groups of 20-50 participants to discuss topics in software engineering research and practice. They serve as incubators for scientific communities and provide opportunities for early discussions of research ideas.
workshop_information.publishing: Workshop papers will be published by the ACM.

summary.conditions: ICSE 2026 will not cover registration, travel, or other arrangements for organizers. Workshop organizers cannot submit papers to their own workshop.
